maqras.text: Didyou not see those who replaced the blessings of God with rejection, and they caused their people to dwell in the abode of destruction
Hell is where they will burn, what a miserable place to settle
Andthey made to God equals in order that they may misguide from His path. Say: "Enjoy, for your destiny is to the Fire

Sayto My servants who believe, that they should hold the contact prayer, and spend from what provisions We granted them secretly and openly, before a Day comes when there is no trade therein, nor will there be any friends

Godis the One who has created the heavens and the earth, and He has sent down water from the sky thus bringing out with it fruits as provisions for you, and He has commissioned for you the ships to run in the sea by His command, and He has commissioned for you the rivers
AndHe has commissioned for you the sun and the moon, in continuity; and He has commissioned for you the night and the day
AndHe has given you from all that you have asked Him. And if you count the blessings of God, you will not be able to number them. Man is indeed transgressing, disbelieving
AndAbraham said: "My Lord, make this a land of peace, and keep me and my sons away from serving statues
MyLord, they have misguided many from among the people. So, whoever follows me, then he is of me, and whoever disobeys me, then You are Forgiving, Merciful

OurLord, I have resided part of my progeny in a barren valley near your Restricted Sanctuary. Our Lord, that they may hold the contact prayer, so let the hearts of the people incline towards them and give provisions to them of the fruits that they may give thanks
Our Lord, you know what we hide and what we declare. And nothing at all is hidden from God on the earth or in the heavens
Praise be to God who has granted me to my old age Ishmael and Isaac; my Lord is Hearer of the prayer
MyLord, let me hold the contact prayer, and also from my progeny. Our Lord, and accept my prayer
Our Lord, forgive me and my parents, and the believers on the Day the judgment is called
Anddo not think that God is unaware of what the wicked do. He is merely delaying them to a Day when all eyes are watching
They will approach with their heads bowed, and their eyes will not blink, and their hearts will be void

Andwarn the people of the Day when the retribution will come to them, and those who have been wicked will say: "Our Lord, delay this for us until a short time, and we will heed your call and follow the messengers!" Did you not swear before this that you would last forever
Andyou resided in the dwellings of those who had wronged themselves, and it was made clear to you what We did to them; and We had put forth the examples for you
Andthey schemed their scheming, and their scheming is known to God; and their scheming was enough to make the mountains cease to exist
So do not think that God will fail to keep His promise to His messengers. God is Noble, capable of seeking revenge
TheDay the earth is replaced with another earth, as are the heavens, and they will appear before God, the One, the Supreme
Andyou will see the criminals that Day bound together in fetters
Their clothes will be of tar, and the fire will overwhelm their faces
Thus God will recompense every soul for what it had earned. God is swift to reckoning
This is a proclamation for the people and so that they are warned with it, and so that they know that there is but One god, and so that those who possess intelligence will remember
